wp:term.wp:term_description: New Feature! You can create your portfolio listing pages without a layout limit!

item.title: Shortcodes
item.dc:creator: Tolga Can
item.content:encoded:
Useful Shortcodes and Tools
RT-Theme 13 has tons of shortcuts and an handy shortcode importer button on the editor which lets you add the shortcodes easily.

  • Sliders and Photo Galleries
  • Lightbox and Auto Thumbnails
  • Other Shortcodes
  • Contact Form Shorcodes
[/list]

item.title: Lightbox and Auto Thumbnails
item.dc:creator: Tolga Can
item.content:encoded:
There too many parameters of this shorcode. You can find detailed instructions on the documentation file. Here are some examples;
Auto thumbnail, lightbox, left align
[line] [auto_thumb width="300" height="100" link="" lightbox="" align="left" title="" alt="" iframe=""] http://rttheme13.templatemints.com/wp-content/uploads/2011/01/nivo1.jpg [/auto_thumb] [show_shortcode] [auto_thumb width="300" height="100" link="" lightbox="" align="left" title="" alt="" iframe=""] full path of your image [/auto_thumb] [/show_shortcode] [line]
Auto thumbnail, link to a video, lightbox, right align
[line] [auto_thumb width="300" height="100" link="http://vimeo.com/8245346" lightbox="" align="right" title="" alt="" iframe=""] http://rttheme13.templatemints.com/wp-content/uploads/2011/01/nivo1.jpg [/auto_thumb] [show_shortcode] [auto_thumb width="300" height="100" link="http://vimeo.com/8245346" lightbox="" align="right" title="" alt="" iframe=""] full path of your image [/auto_thumb] [/show_shortcode] [line]
Auto thumbnail, link to an external url, lightbox, center align
[line] [auto_thumb width="300" height="100" link="http://google.com" lightbox="" align="center" title="" alt="" iframe="true"] http://rttheme13.templatemints.com/wp-content/uploads/2011/01/nivo1.jpg [/auto_thumb] [show_shortcode] [auto_thumb width="300" height="100" link="http://google.com" lightbox="" align="center" title="" alt="" iframe="true"] full path of your image [/auto_thumb] [/show_shortcode]
Auto thumbnail, lightbox, left align, image border
[line] [auto_thumb width="300" height="100" link="" lightbox="" align="left" title="" alt="" iframe="" frame="yes"] http://rttheme13.templatemints.com/wp-content/uploads/2011/01/nivo1.jpg [/auto_thumb] [show_shortcode] [auto_thumb width="300" height="100" link="" lightbox="" align="left" title="" alt="" iframe="" frame="yes"] full path of your image [/auto_thumb] [/show_shortcode]
